sourcesContent:
import './PersonalInfo.css' function PersonalInfo({ State, Dispatch, HandleChange, Mail,SetName,Name}) { return (

Personal info

Please provide your name, email address, and phone number.

SetName(e.target.value)} name='fullName' type='text' id='name' className='py-md-3 mb-md-2' placeholder='e.g ds King' />
Mail(e)} name='email' type='text' id='mail' className='py-md-3 mb-md-2' placeholder='e.g. stephenking@lorem.com'/>
HandleChange(e)} name='phoneNumber' type='text' id='phone' className='py-md-3' placeholder='e.g. +1 234 567 890'/>
) } export default PersonalInfo
